meanings.sent1: The simple shapes were renderable in the drawing.
meanings.sent2: The renderable image was easy to understand.
meanings.sent3: The renderable clouds looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her renderable smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The renderable landscape painted a beautiful scene in my mind.

meanings.definition: Able to be converted or transformed.
meanings.sent1: The renderable data could be changed into a graph.
meanings.sent2: The renderable material could be molded into different shapes.
meanings.sent3: The renderable pumpkin turned into a carriage at midnight.
meanings.sent4: His renderable ideas transformed the company's success.
meanings.sent5: The renderable clay could become anything the artist imagined.

meanings.sent1: The renderable scene was perfect for the movie.
meanings.sent2: The renderable character was brought to life on screen.
meanings.sent3: The renderable cake looked so real, I almost tried to eat it.
meanings.sent4: Her renderable emotions were captured in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The renderable details in the artwork made it come alive.
